name: QR Food ordering
short: A FullStack project that makes ordering food process in restaurant simpler by making an order from table using our mobile.

name: Student Data Management system
short: A FullStack project that manages students details in database and shows the details whenever requires.

name: Minichat application
short: A Node.js based application which can be easily integrated into your application so that users can chat easily when they are collaboratively working on same document like google docs.

name: login-registration
short: A Node.js Based login and register application which have 2-factor authentication facitility.

name: Weather App
short: A React Based application which finds weather status of selected city

name: laptop store
short: A  Node.js Based application which displays collection of laptops and shows its feautures when it is selected.

name: forkify
short: A  javascript Based application which allows users to search food recipes and can favourite them if liked and also can add to their cart.

name: Pig Game
short: A javascript based Dice game with 3 diffrent sets of rules.
